name: Morning Glory Low Loft Batting, 110" x 110"

reviews.name: Morning Glory Low Loft Batting, 110" x 110"
reviews.reviewText:
My local store was out of batting, and I was needing to finish this quilt so I went to walmart.com and found this product. When it arrived I got 4 rolls of king size batting! fabulous! I spent $20 and got 4 rolls! A quilters (and a thifty persons) bargain. I now enough to finish Christmas.

The quality of the product is good. and in tact.
reviews.title: Awesome deal!

reviews.name: Morning Glory Low Loft Batting, 110" x 110"
reviews.reviewText: There was some confusion of the "4-pack". Yes, I did get 4 individual sleeves of 110x110 batting after the very helpful Walmart woman saw the internet order. It seems the UPC code of the "4-pack" is the same as the "single". Walmart needs to get that corrected for this item as well as for several other batting "4-pack" and "3-pack" items. This is very nice batting, with an even loft and no bunching. I actually got 6 blankets out of each 110x110 roll and for the price it worked very well in the baby blankets I made. I will definitely purchase the Morning Glory brand again.
reviews.title: Great batting and good price

reviews.name: Morning Glory Low Loft Batting, 110" x 110"
reviews.reviewText: I had read reviews on this product and since I am new at my craft and did not want to spend a whole lot of money on batting, I thought I would give it a try. I was not disappointed. These are ten dollars per pack in the store and I got four for twenty. Not bad at all.
reviews.title: Great Value for Price

reviews.name: Morning Glory Low Loft Batting, 110" x 110"
reviews.reviewText: I know a lot of people ordered this and only received one 110 x 110 roll of the batting, but I think Walmart has finally cleared up the confusion. I received all 4 rolls of 110 x 110 batting in a large box. The box had a sticker on the top for the employees that basically said to not separate the rolls because it is sold as a "set", so to speak. You really cannot beat the price for 4 huge rolls of batting! I will definitely purchase this again for future projects!
reviews.title: Amazing Deal

reviews.name: Morning Glory Low Loft Batting, 110" x 110"
reviews.reviewText: Thiis is my fdavorite batting for quilting. You really stock it in store.
reviews.title: It Is Great!
